title: All champions free was the worst desicion riot has made
body: I have not had this many afks in years. Normals is just a giant "first time _____" shitshow of bad plays. Games are decided by who knows how to play a champion.

replies.body:
AFK =/= Free week.
There is zero correlation.
An AFKer is an AFKer regardless.

Get over it.

It's basically just a way for people to try out champions they wouldn't normally have the opportunity to use, without having to wait for them to be on the free rotation, which could take months. The best place for this to happen is in normals, because it's the "standard" mode of the game and has no impact on ranked.

Let people try and learn, it's the only way they'll get better, and considering the problem is that people are "bad" I'd think you'd want them to get better.

I think having all champions free is great, not only for people trying out new fun champions, but its fantastic for diversity of champions in game _(something that was very much lacking, and has been for a long time.)_

Jungle is not solely Lee Sin for a week. 
Adc has a few champs other than Vayne or... Vayne..?

It's so much fun seeing so many champion combos that you just haven't played with or against for so long! :)
No one takes normal (and flex queue) games seriously

Why not try the champions you have not played before in beginner Coop vs AI mode first, then move on to intermediate coop vs AI. before you play them in pvp?
Usually I don't use any champions that I am not good at in pvp, I play them in Coop vs AI.
Otherwise you can play them in custom game, invite someone to verse you if you need to.
HeartVine is right, having all the champions free for a period time gives more opportunities for everyone to try out what they want to, instead of waiting.
